attributes.action: PROVIDE AID TO PREVENT CHILD PROSTITUTION IN ZIMBABWE!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
after amnesty's irene khan's recent visit to zimbabwe this week the level of human rights violation was massive, the most disturbing of which was that girls as young as twelve according to a deputy head teacher interviewed by the bbc, are so impoverished have been selling themselves for as little as

 "it could be books, it could be biscuits, chips, some even just to be given a hug." 

lets stop this now and protect these vulnerable children!
